## DynamicFormBuilder.bindObserver() method

Constructs selectors for TForm and TState with observable setters

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bindObserver<TFormSlice extends string, TStateSlice extends keyof TInputState, TReturnValue>(formSlice: ValidFormSlice<DeepRequired<TForm>, TFormSlice>[], stateSlice: TStateSlice[], setter: FormStateSelectorFn<Observable<DeepPropsObject<ConstructSliceFromPath<TFormSlice, TForm>, TFormSlice>>, Observable<Partial<PickOr<TInputState, TStateSlice, never>>>, Observable<TReturnValue>>): FormStateObserverSelector<ConstructSliceFromPath<TFormSlice, TForm>, PickOr<TInputState, TStateSlice, never>, TReturnValue, string, TStateSlice>;
```
